bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of an unusual disease with red eyes and dilated nose, massive panting, macules developing all over the body, and the hair on the body and head turning stiff. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hua shi 滑石 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 熱毒怪病，眼赤鼻張，大喘，渾身 生斑，毛髮起如銅鐵 , “ Queer disease of heat poisoning : The eyes are red, and the nose is dilated. Massive panting. Macules develop all over the body. The hair on the body and head rises as if it were of copper or iron”.
